<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">PointerIntPairInfo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// PointerIntPair - This class implements a pair of a pointer and small</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">/// integer.  It is designed to represent this in the space required by one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pointer by bitmangling the integer into the low part of the pointer.  This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// can only be done for small integers: typically up to 3 bits, but it depends</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// on the number of bits available according to PointerLikeTypeTraits for the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// type.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that PointerIntPair always puts the IntVal part in the highest bits</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">/// possible.  For example, PointerIntPair&lt;void&#42;, 1, bool&gt; will put the bit for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the bool into bit #2, not bit #0, which allows the low two bits to be used</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for something else.  For example, this allows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">///   PointerIntPair&lt;PointerIntPair&lt;void&#42;, 1, bool&gt;, 1, bool&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ... and the two bools will land in different bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41f670c80fbc831d70a472b03c4739ae">PointerTy</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IntBits, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IntType = unsigned,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PtrTraits = PointerLikeTypeTraits&lt;PointerTy&gt;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a> = PointerIntPairInfo&lt;PointerTy, IntBits, PtrTraits&gt;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerintpair"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerintpair/#a7ad48fb0630d5c2580d123f11e76e885">PointerIntPair</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Used by MSVC visualizer and generally helpful for debugging/visualizing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">InfoTy = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/punnedpointer">detail::PunnedPointer&lt;PointerTy&gt;</a> Value;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(IntBits &lt;= PtrTraits::NumLowBitsAvailable,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;PointerIntPair with integer size too large for pointer&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4">MaskAndShiftConstants</a> : uintptr&#95;t &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// PointerBitMask - The bits that come from the pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a3a51956fad564a5f8c9a923b17963cfa"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a3a51956fad564a5f8c9a923b17963cfa">PointerBitMask</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">        ~(uintptr&#95;t)(((intptr&#95;t)1 &lt;&lt; PtrTraits::NumLowBitsAvailable) - 1),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// IntShift - The number of low bits that we reserve for other uses, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// keep zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a1dd9e7252764042009f043bb2a8ad5f7"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a1dd9e7252764042009f043bb2a8ad5f7">IntShift</a> = (uintptr&#95;t)PtrTraits::NumLowBitsAvailable - IntBits,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// IntMask - This is the unshifted mask for valid bits of the int type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4aadb9eb34960575d9dd59b4b765c1fd25"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4aadb9eb34960575d9dd59b4b765c1fd25">IntMask</a> = (uintptr&#95;t)(((intptr&#95;t)1 &lt;&lt; IntBits) - 1),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ShiftedIntMask - This is the bits for the integer shifted in place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a3bceb0d2563c4e0a9df22ae7b81b9387"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a3bceb0d2563c4e0a9df22ae7b81b9387">ShiftedIntMask</a> = (uintptr&#95;t)(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4aadb9eb34960575d9dd59b4b765c1fd25">IntMask</a> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerintpairinfo/#a753cd347a2578a1d1a4c3a6141c238f4a1dd9e7252764042009f043bb2a8ad5f7">IntShift</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
